channel.title: python on Timothy Ford
channel.description: Recent content in python on Timothy Ford

item.title: HomeMetricsLLC
item.description: Co-Founder and CTO @ HomeMetricsLLC Hi, I am Timothy Ford, one of the founding members of HomeMetricsLLC. On top of leading the project development, I also work heavily on the HomeMetrics Android App (Native Development in Java) (on the Play Store soon!) as well as our backend API (Python and FastAPI hosted on GCP). Awards/Achievments Braun Inventor Award 2nd in South Dakota Giant Vision Business Competition 3rd in USD i2i Business Plan Competition

item.title: Cilantro Timelapse
item.description: I’m Back with Cilantro After recording my initial timelapse of basil, I learned many things that would make the process much easier than the first time. Since my cilantro decided to finally pop through the soil, I decided I would use this knowledge going forward to make yet another timelapse of seedlings, but this time much easier. The first thing I did was used what I thought was a higher quality camera (Logitech c270 I believe).

item.title: Welcome and See Basil Grow
item.description: Welcome Hello everyone, if you’re here, you probably have a reason to be here as well as a reason to be browsing through. If not, hi. You can learn about what I care about and do in the About page, see some of the projects I work on in Projects, and of course read about my thoughts in Posts. You can find me the places that matter most to me by following the links in the top right.
